issue.title: [CF 127] Easier Party/Raid Checking
issue.body:
Now that you can check for buffs in multiple units, it would be nice to be able to set it up easily so that it would check an entire party/raid. Like for example a priest checking for Prayer of Mending on anybody in a raid, I wouldn't like to have to put raid1;raid2;...;raid25 to do it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Beruchan | Imported from CurseForge issue #127 | Raw
